DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess non-inferiority non- pharmacological breast milk express versus oral sucrose relief procedural pain venipuncture preterm neonates . This experimental comparative study non-inferiority randomize crossover , perform Neonatal unit hospital Community Madrid . The 54 pair preterm selection criterion include study , perform randomization sequence breast milk express receive oral 24 % sucrose . The dos administer : 0.1ml preterm less 27 week correct gestational age ( CGA ) , 0.25 ml infant 27 31 week CGA 0.5 ml infant 32-37 week . Both group accompany non-nutritive suck swaddle administer two minute prior venipuncture . The outcome variable , pain , determine scale Premature Infant Pain Profile ( PIPP ) percent cry . Data primary objective analyse per intention treat . This study approve local ethical committee .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Breast Milk Expressed Sucrose Procedural Pain Preterm
DOC.criteria: Preterm neonate . Weight less 2500 gram . Feed breastfeeding ( exclusive ) obtain weight express breastmilk . Be informed consent parent infants previously request . Maternal use opioids insulindepent infant invasive artificial respiration infant major congenital anomaly infant grade II IV intraventricular hemorrhage stroke receive parental sedative vasoactive drug infant necrotizing enterocolitis surgical intervention infant absolute diet infant abstinence syndrome
